column2: 魔法の属性と装備について

column3: You can change the settings for magic

column2: メニュー画面の「Magic」から設定できるよ
これが\N[5]の魔法の状態だね

column3: Going in order from the top\c\.

column2: 黒属性の魔法を装備できる枠が２つ
column3: there are two slots to equip black magic spells\c

column2: 黒属性と炎属性のどちらか…
column3: then a slot for either a black spell or a fire spell\c

column2: 黒属性と氷属性のどちらかの
column3: then a slot for either a black spell or an ice spell\c

column2: 最後の共通属性の魔法を合わせて
column3: and finally a common element spell slot
that brings the total to five spells
column4: that can be equipped at once.
